name: clayoquot toque
sizes_available: newborn (baby, toddler, child, adult s, m, l)
notes:
--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

**clayoquot toque** - by tin can knits
============

--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

*this modern fair-isle hat is a great ‘blank canvas’ for testing yarns and colour combinations.  use it as a swatch before you make the [clayoquot cardigan][1], and you will have an adorable matching set!*

--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

**like our knits?**  [get our email updates][4] to hear about new designs, tutorials and subscriber-only special offers!

--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

**pattern info**
============

**sizing:**   
newborn (baby, toddler, child, **adult s, m, l**)
to fit head: 14 (16, 17.5, 19, **20, 21.5, 23**)” around

**yarn**   
dk weight yarn in 3 colours
mc: 70 (80, 90, 100, 120, 140, 160) yds 
cc1: 20 (20, 30, 30, 40, 40, 40) yds  
cc2: 10 (10, 15, 15, 20, 20, 20) yds
*(samples shown in [sweet fiber merino twist dk][5] in ‘paper birch’, ‘marshland’, ‘something blue’, and ‘sea glass’, ‘canary’, ‘spanish coin’)*

**needles:**  
us #4 / 3.5mm and us #6 / 4mm
16” circular needle and dpns in each size
*(or as req’d to meet gauge)*

**gauge:**  
22 sts and 28 rounds  per 4” in st. st. on larger needles 

**notions:** 
stitch markers, darning needle

**helpful tutorials**
[choosing a colour palette][6]
[let's knit a hat][7]
[casting onto circular needles][8]
[knitting with double pointed needles][9]
[magic loop][10]

--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

for all pattern abbreviations, techniques, and to contact us, visit [www.tincanknits.com][11]

--------------------------------------------------------
